summary: AN ORDINANCE accepting electrical overhead and underground distribution easements over portions of Government Lot 4, Section 10, Township 25 North, Range 3 East, W.M.; Vacated Perkins Lane West; Tract "X", King County Short Plat No. 884008; Riverside Interurban Tracts; Vacated 11th Avenue and east Cherry; Vacated 11th Avenue and East Madison; King County Short Plat No. 676070; Parker's Addition; Short Plat No. 83-537; Thormods Addition; as described below and placing said easements under the jurisdiction of the City Light Department.
